projects.title: elpowr.ai - building management platform
projects.description: A Climate Tech platform utilizing AI-driven predictive building management to optimize energy efficiency. elpowr.ai helps property owners improve building sustainability by analyzing energy consumption, market data, and financial incentives to maximize energy savings.

projects.title: The Black-athon - Blhackathon.dev
projects.description: A hackathon and pitch competition designed to empower Black tech innovators, creatives, and developers. The event fosters collaboration, networking, and education while showcasing diverse talent in the tech industry.

projects.title: The Digital Builders 757!
projects.description: As the founder of The Digital Builders 757, I spearhead an ambitious initiative aimed at democratizing technology education and fostering a vibrant coding community in the Hampton Roads area. Originating from my personal journey of self-taught coding that led me from truck driving to a successful career in software engineering, The Digital Builders 757 is a testament to the transformative power of technology.

projects.title: Pallet Management System
projects.description: A modern, intuitive web-based application for efficient management of pallet spaces in warehouses or logistics centers. Utilizes Firebase Realtime Database for dynamic, real-time data handling.

projects.title: Black Theatre United
projects.description: Was members of the Black theatre community, we stand together to help protect Black people, Black theatre, and Black lives of all shapes and orientations in communities across the country.

projects.title: Eileen Brewer's Website
projects.description: Eileen Brewer is a global catalyst in STEM education, entrepreneurship.

projects.title: E&T Cash Home Offers
projects.description: A real estate solutions and investment firm specializing in helping homeowners quickly sell burdensome houses. The platform offers fair cash offers with no realtors, commissions, or hidden fees, allowing homeowners to sell their properties as-is.
